question_text: Did you have a sickle cell crisis today?
Did you seek medical care, including calling, for this crisis? (Mark all that apply)
Did you seek medical care TODAY, including calling, for any reason other than a crisis? (Mark all that apply)
How often today have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?
How often today did you feel that you were unable to control the important things in your life?
How often today have you felt that things were going your way?
How often today have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?
Rate your lowest level of pain experienced throughout the entire day. TWH: FIX THIS AS A SLIDER WITH TOP AND BOTTOM LABELS
Rate your highest level of pain experienced throughout the entire day. TWH: FIX THIS AS A SLIDER WITH TOP AND BOTTOM LABELS
Rate your average (typical) level of pain experienced throughout the entire day. TWH: FIX THIS AS A SLIDER WITH TOP AND BOTTOM LABELS
Rate your current level of pain. TWH: FIX THIS AS A SLIDER WITH TOP AND BOTTOM LABELS
Rate the degree to which pain interfered with WORK related activities today. TWH: FIX THIS AS A SLIDER WITH TOP AND BOTTOM LABELS

When you had pain during the past day (including now)...

I told myself I couldn’t let the pain stand in the way of what I have to do.

When you had pain during the past day (including now)...

I kept thinking about how much I hurt.

When you had pain during the past day (including now)...

I couldn’t seem to keep my pain out of my mind.

When you had pain during the past day (including now)...

I saw the pain as a challenge and didn’t let it bother me.

When you had pain during the past day (including now)...

I kept thinking about how badly I wanted my pain to stop.

When you had pain during the past day (including now)...

I felt my pain overwhelmed me.

When you had pain during the past day (including now)...

I was afraid my pain would get worse.
How much time did you spend today lying down, either in bed or on a couch? TWH: FIX THIS WITH HOURS AND MINUTES
How much time did you spend today napping? TWH: MAKE THIS MINUTES ONLY
Did you take any pain medications today?
How many pills of PRE-POPULATED OPIOID MEDICATION 1 did you take? TWH: FIX THIS AS A NUMBER CHOOSER
How many pills of PRE-POPULATED OPIOID MEDICATION 2 did you take? TWH: FIX THIS AS A NUMBER CHOOSER
How many pills of PRE-POPULATED OPIOID MEDICATION N did you take? TWH: FIX THIS AS A NUMBER CHOOSER
